scripts.vercel-build: zenstack generate && tsc && prisma db push && prisma db seed
scripts.up: npm run package-clean && npm install --save-exact -D zenstack@latest @zenstackhq/openapi@latest && npm install --save-exact @zenstackhq/runtime@latest @zenstackhq/server@latest
scripts.up-preview: npm run package-clean && npm install --registry https://packagecloud.io/ymc9/zenstack-preview/npm --save-exact -D zenstack@latest @zenstackhq/openapi@latest && npm install --registry https://packagecloud.io/ymc9/zenstack-preview/npm --save-exact @zenstackhq/runtime@latest @zenstackhq/server@latest
